CommentBody: Scheduled a meeting for 19/12/2024 to collect backups of jobs and NEA config to reference while building out the new system.
Glenda was not able to make the meeting, sent a new meeting link to reschedule the data gathering task we had planned for Dec 19th to be moved to another day.

Meeting on Dec 23rd, we were able to install the application on the new server and configure the database. Host discovery was configured and scheduled for daily runs. Glenda checked in on the 24th, and confirmed that the hosts are showing up as expected.

Installed and configured the Sensitive Data Discovery module and the Access information center.
We verified that the Access information center is getting information.
We setup a file server host list and setup file scans to start using this server list.
Configures file system scans and setup schedules. Initial scans are taking quite some time so we will let them run on their schedule and follow up on them after the holiday.
